251106.「それ以上 近寄らんといて……。\n 大丈夫や。大丈夫やから……。:
Don't come any closer... it's okay. It's okay,
it's okay...

251111.「ヨイちゃんのことが 気になって\n こっそり 後をつけてきたの。\n 何もなか:
I was worried about Yoi, so I secretly
followed him. I was going to leave right away
if nothing happened!

251112.「でも 苦しそうなヨイちゃんを見ていたら\n いてもたっても いられなくなって…:
But when I saw Yoi in pain, I couldn't stand
still...

251116.「テンジョウ チジョウ オボロゲナル\n ハザマヨリウマレシ モウリョウヲ\n:
Tenjo chijo oborogenaru hazamayori umareshi
mouriowo haraiitamai kyometamae!

251122.「欲していた身体ではないが…… まァよい。\n これも なかなか悪くない。陰衆:
It's not the body I wanted, but... oh well.
This is not so bad. Inshu, I'll take over for
you and clear away your long held grudges.

251123.「遠からず この身体を 完全に我が物とする。\n その時を せいぜ……い 楽しみ:
In the not-too-distant future, I will own this body completely. You can look forward to that time at best. Weak chieftain of the
underworld...

251124.「うそや……。\n なんで こんなことに……。: No way... why did this happen...

251125.「自分の中でうごめく 何者かが\n ウチの身体を狙ってるんは わかってた。\n:
I knew that there was something inside of me
that was trying to get to me. So I knew I had
to do something.

251126.「ほんで <pc>に相談しようとしたんや。\n せやのに なんで よりによって:
Then I tried to talk to <pc> about
it. So why, of all people, would Asahi cover
for us, and then we end up in this mess!

251127.「ウチの中から出てきた何者か……アイツは\n 陰衆の積年の怨念が どうとか言うて:
The person who came out from inside our house... he said something about a long- standing grudge against the Yinshu. Maybe it
has something to do with the Yinshu's past.

251128.「ちょうど ウチのばあちゃんが王都勤めの陰衆の\n 巡察のために カミハルムイに:
My grandma is just coming to Kamiharmui to
inspect the Yinshu, the Royal City workers.
She should know something about this.

251129.「なぁ。王都カミハルムイ南の 宿屋の２階に\n 来てくれへんやろか？ 一緒に ば:
Hey. Could you come to Inn 2F of Royal City
Kamiharmui South? Together, we will find out
how to rescue Asahi from Granny.

251130.「お願い。どうか……\n アサヒを…… アサヒを……。: Please. Please... let Asahi... let Asahi...

251131.「この奥に 先々代の陰衆の頭領……\n サヨばあちゃんが おるはずや。:
In the back of this room, there should be
Sayo's grandmother, the leader of the Yinshu
before her.

251132.「陰衆の長老 サヨおばあさま。\n ご挨拶が 遅うなり 申し訳ありません。\n:
Elder of the Yinshu, Grandmother Sayo. I
apologize for the delay in greeting you. I am
Yoi, the leader of this generation.

251133.「あらまぁ。\n ずいぶん 懐かしい声やこと。: Oh, my. That's a very nostalgic voice.

251134.「久しぶりに 孫に会える思うて\n 楽しみにしとったんよ。\n さぞや お仕事が:
I was looking forward to seeing my grandson
for the first time in a long time. I bet
you're getting along just fine, aren't you?

251135.「私は ロクに挨拶にも 来いひん\n そんな礼節も わきまえないような子に\n:
I don't remember training a child who had no
sense of propriety, who didn't even come to
greet me.

251136.「ごめんて サヨばあちゃん。\n すぐ 来るつもりやってんけど……\n ちょっと:
Sorry, Grandma Sayo. I was going to come over
right away, but... things got a little out of
hand.

251137.「……はて。じつの祖母に 挨拶にくるよりも\n 優先せな あかんこととは\n い:
Well.... What on earth is a bigger priority
than coming to say hello to my grandmother?

251139.「ウチの影から おぞましい魔物が生まれて\n アサヒが アサヒの身体が……\n:
A horrifying monster was born from our shadow,
and Asahi's body... was taken over by the
monster.

251140.「アサヒやて？\n あの小憎たらしい 陽衆の娘のことかえ？:
Asahi? You mean that little hateful Yang Clan
girl?

251141.「……そうや。 \n 魔物は 陰衆の積年の怨念がどうとか言うてた。\n 何か 陰:
That's right. The monsters were saying something about a long-standing grudge against the Yinshu. I thought it might have something
to do with the Yinshu.

251142.「ばあちゃん。アサヒを助ける方法を\n 知っとったら 教えてくれへん？:
Grandma. If you know how to help Asahi, would
you please tell me?

251143.「ずいぶん その陽衆のアサヒとやらと\n 仲良うしてはるようやねえ？ 落陽の草原:
You seem to be getting along well with this
Asahi of the Yang Clan, don't you? I saw them
together at Sunset Meadow.

251144.「あんな陽衆の小娘と つるんでからに。\n ……しまいには その陽衆を 助けたい:
After hanging out with that little Yang Clan
girl. And then you want to help that Yang
Clan? Just leave that kind of thing alone.

251145.「そやかて あの魔物は ウチから生まれたんや。\n ほっとけるわけないやん。それ:
That's right. That monster was born from us. There's no way we can leave it alone. Besides, we don't know what kind of misfortune that
monster will bring.

251146.「ばあちゃん お願いします。この通りや。\n どないなことでもええ。あの魔物につ:
Grandma, please. Just like that. Anything you
want. If you know anything about that monster,
please tell us.

251147.「……そんなもん 知りまへんわ。\n せやけど……: I don't know anything about that. But...

251148.「確かに その魔物っちゅうんのを放っておくのは\n 危険やね。ほんなら そんなも:
It is indeed dangerous to leave that monster
unattended. Then, why don't you just bury that
little Yang Clan girl?

251149.「ヨイ。ええか？ これは 因果や。\n あの小娘が これまで陰衆をコケにしてきた:
Yoi. You okay? This is karma. That little girl
has been mocking the yin people, and now the
karmic retribution has come.

251150.「そんなことあらへん！ これからは陽衆と陰衆が\n 手を取りあっていこうって 和:
That's not true! From now on, the Yang Clan and the Yin Clan have made peace by working hand in hand. Even grandma knows that, don't
you?

251151.「だまらっしゃい！ 私は そないなこと\n 許した覚えは ありまへん。我ら陰衆の:
Stop talking! I have no intention of allowing such a thing. I can't tell you how much our ancestors of the Yinshu have suffered from
such frustration.

251152.「……とにかく。お前が やらんって言うなら \n 私が 災いを 止めるしかありま:
Anyway... If you won't do it, I'll have to
stop the plague. It's hard for an old man to
talk about this.

251153.「ほな 行くで。\n ひと仕事や。: Well, let's go. I've got work to do.

251155.「<pc>…… どないしよ？\n いったん 陽衆の隠れ家に戻ろか……。:
<pc>... what are we going to do?
Let's go back to the Yang Clan Hideout for a
while...

251156.「<cs_pchero> お待たせ。\n 天地の儀をおこなう 覚悟は できとる。:
<cs_pchero> Sorry to keep you waiting. I am
ready to perform the rites of heaven and
earth.

251157.「せやけど 知っての通り 天地の儀は\n 儀式をおこなう ふたりの心……\n 陰:
But as you know, the rituals of heaven and earth cannot succeed unless the two minds that perform them, the yin and the yang, become
one.

251158.「陽衆の頭領である アサヒがおらん今 \n その代わりを 務められる者は\n <:
With the Yang Clan chieftain, Asahi, gone,
there is no one but you <cs_pchero> who can
take his place.

251159.「ウチも <cs_pchero>となら \n 心を ひとつにできると 思うとる。:
I also think that we can unite our hearts with
<cs_pchero>. What do you think? Will you
perform the ritual with me?<yesno><close>

251160.「……いけずなこと 言わんといて。\n これは アサヒを救うためにも 必要なんや:
Don't say such a naughty thing. This is
necessary to save Asahi. Will you perform the
ritual with us?<yesno><close>

251161.「ほんま おおきに。恩に着るわ。: Thank you very much. I owe you.

251162.「ウチが 呪文を唱えるから <cs_pchero>は\n それに合わせて 祈って:
I'll cast the spell, and you <cs_pchero>
just pray along with it. All right, let's get
started.

251166.<center>我が名は テンオツ貴人……。\nあまつちに 和を もたらす者。:
My name is Nobleman Tenotsu, and I am the one
who brings harmony to our land.

251167.<center>芽吹く花々。空は光り輝き。\n水は流れ めぐりゆく。\nとどこお:
Flowers budding. The sky shines. Water flows
and flows. All is harmony itself.

251168.<center>我を呼び覚ませし 陰衆の頭領よ……\n汝は 我に 何を求めるのか:
Awaken me, chieftain of the underworld, what
do you seek from me? If you want my help, you
must show me your determination.

251170.「コイツらを 倒さんと\n 話を 聞いてもらえんようやね。\n 行くで <cs_:
I guess we'll have to beat these guys to get
them to listen to us. Let's go <cs_pchero>.

251171.<center>我が獣たちを しりぞけるか……。\n話を聞こう 陰衆の頭領よ。:
If you would make my beasts flinch... let us
hear what you have to say, chieftain of the
Yin.

251172.「ウチから 生まれた魔物のせいで\n 陽衆の頭領である アサヒが\n 身体を の:
Asahi, the chieftain of the Yang Clan, has had
his body taken over by a monster that was born
from his home.

251173.「大幻魔 テンオツ貴人さまなら\n 何か 彼女を救う方法を ご存じかと考え\n:
I thought that the great phantasmal Nobleman Tenotsu might have some way to save her, and so, with all due respect, I asked for your
help in this matter.

251174.<center>強き闇を制するには 強き心が必要。\n闇を御しきれぬ者は\nやが:
A strong heart is necessary to conquer a
strong darkness. Those who cannot control the
darkness will soon find themselves undermined.

251175.<center>闇の名は…… 陰果の罪業。\n陰衆が紡いできた因果は 未熟な頭領:
The name of darkness is... Sin of Yin/Yang. It seems that the causality spun by the Yinshu is too heavy for an inexperienced chieftain to
bear alone.

251176.「陰果の罪業……。\n それは 陰衆の頭領であるウチが 弱いから\n この事態を:
Sin of Yin/Yang... does that mean that we, as
the chieftains of the Yin, have brought about
this situation because we are weak?

251177.<center>無論 かつての天地雷鳴士の歴史にも\n同じような 変事はあった。:
Of course, there have been similar incidents in the history of druids in the past. A chieftain who cannot control the darkness will
bring disaster to the world.

251178.「そないなこと……。\n ウチは どないしたら ええんでしょうか？: What should we do about that?

251179.<center>……なすべきは ひとつ。\nかつての天地雷鳴士が 災いを食い止め:
There is only one thing to do. Find the secret
that Druid once used to stop the plague.

251180.「すべては ウチの弱さが 招いたこと？\n ウチ もしかして まだ\n 心の奥底:
Was it all brought about by our weakness? Do
you think that deep down we still have
feelings for Asahi?

251181.「ううん。今は 迷ってるヒマやない。\n ウチが どうにかせんと アサヒは……。:
No, I don't think so. Now is not the time to
be lost. If we don't do something, Asahi
will...

251182.「そのためにも テンオツ貴人が言うてた\n かつての天地雷鳴士が 使ったという\:
To do so, we must find the secret technique
that Nobleman Tenotsu said was used by the
druids of the past.

251183.「ウチが探しておくから <cs_pchero>は\n それまで 身体を 休めとい:
We'll look for you, <cs_pchero> just rest
your body until then.

251184.「それから ここまで 協力してくれた礼や。\n 遠慮せんと 受け取っとき。:
Also, this is a thank-you for helping us get
this far. Don't hesitate to take it.

251185.「また 何か進展があったら\n <cs_pchero>を 呼ぶさかい。\n その:
I will call <cs_pchero> if there are any
more developments. If you do, please lend me
your help.
